feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Build Apps
feed.subtitle: SAP Build Apps Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: How to Automatically Reflect Fixed Excel Data into SAP Build Apps Input Fields?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

We are currently developing an application screen using SAP BTP Build Apps, and we would like to implement a feature that automatically reflects data from a fixed-format Excel file into input fields configured in Build Apps.

However, based on the information we’ve researched so far, we haven’t been able to find a clear method to achieve this.

Does anyone know what kind of functionality or integration we could use to make this possible?
Any advice or guidance would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you for your support!
Best Regards.
Yuya

entry.title: How to upload an Excel file to backend and display data in SAP Build Apps?
entry.content:
Dear All,

I am new to SAP BTP and currently learning SAP Build Apps.
I am trying to create a simple page where a user can:

  • Select an Excel file

  • Upload the data to a backend table

  • At the same time, display the uploaded data in a frontend table

Could someone please guide me on how to achieve this?
Do I need to use any specific connectors, Components, integration flows, or APIs for handling Excel files in SAP Build Apps? Any sample tutorials or best practices would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance

entry.title: Request for build update to support Google Play Console criteria.
entry.content:
Dear all,

I have an application developed with SAP AppGyver that has been available and running for several years on the Google Play Console. Recently, Google Play started requiring package changes, stating that the app must support 16KB page sizes by November 1, 2025. The Google Play Console informed me that it is necessary to recompile the application to ensure 16KB compatibility and allow for continued release of updates after that date.

Therefore, it will be necessary to update the application build so that when editing and publishing new versions, it already complies with the Google Play requirement.

I look forward to your guidance and support regarding this procedure.

My ID: P2006971219.

Sincerely,
Vianeis Rodrigues Pereira

entry.title: Support for 16KB page compatibility in AppGyver, which Google is requiring
entry.content:
The Google Play Console has now required all Android apps to support 16KB pages by November 1, 2025, and has stated that apps will need to be recompiled to ensure continuous updates. Failure to meet this requirement may result in the app being suspended from the platform.

Since we use AppGyver (no-code) to develop our apps, we don't have direct access to the build settings. Therefore, it is essential that, at the time of creation, the app is generated in compliance with this technical requirement, that is, with support for 16KB pages.

In light of this, I am requesting guidance and support from SAP to ensure that, when editing or creating new apps in AppGyver, the generated build package complies with the new Google Play Console requirements.

Thank you in advance for your attention and I look forward to hearing from you with instructions on how to proceed in this case. If possible, please send me the links where I can ask for help, since the build generated in AppGyver is done using no-code, without the possibility of manual adjustments, and must already be compiled in the version requested by Google.

Project ID: P2006971219
Contact email: portfoliozx@gmail.com

Sincerely,
Vianeis Rodrigues Pereira.

entry.title: How to Trigger Reminder Emails for Approvers/Finance Reviewer if No Action After N+2 Days in SAP
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I’m working on a workflow scenario in SAP Build Process Automation where purchase orders go through multiple approval levels (e.g., Approvers and Finance Reviewer).

The requirement is:

  • If an approver or finance reviewer does not take any action within N+2 days (2 days after task creation/assignment), the system should automatically trigger a reminder email.

  • Ideally, this should continue until action is taken, or the task is escalated.

entry.title: 3D Viewer SAP Build Apps
entry.content:
Hi Community,

I am currently creating an App for an "Instruction Guide". In this App all necessary working steps are shown and explained, inculding picture, videos and also 3D Files.

Here's the question: It seems that in Marketplace is no component for showing 3D-Files ( espacially .jt - files) . To solve this, I was binding the jt2go Viewer with an Inline Frame. This is working, but unfortunately, it is always necessary to choose the 3D-Model from the Menu, where all 3D-Models are listed. 

Is there a possible way to show the 3D-Model (.jt) directly in Build Apps?

Many thanks in advance for your help.

Best regards 

Julia

entry.title: How can i export and import a SAP Build Apps project?
entry.content:
Hello,

I have a SAP Build Apps project on a BTP Trial account. now the Account expires and i need to create a new one. How can i export the SAP Build Apps project from the expirering account and import it on the new one?

What i tried:
- i exported/downloaded the .mtar file from the Build and Deploy menu.
- i tried importing the .mtar file in the Import menu in the SAP Build Lobby, but the upload errors with "File type is invalid"


Is there another way to do this?

Best regards,
Finn Ole Hoppe

entry.title: SAP BTP Trial Establish Trust issue
entry.content:
Hello everyone.

I am currently trying to complete a mission on SAP.com using a trial account. I have created a new trial subaccount and added the SAP Cloud Identity Services. The service appears to be added successfully.

However, when I go to Security → Trust Configuration and try to click Establish Trust, I keep getting an error message like the one in the screenshot.

I have already tried the following steps:

  1. Deleted and recreated the trial account.
  2. Added the Cloud Identity Service again.
  3. Created azure instead of amazon.
  4. Repeated the process several times, but the problem remained.

It seems that the subaccount cannot interact properly with IAS (possibly a problem with the tenant registry).

Could you please help me understand why my trial account cannot establish trust?

Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: Error while subscribing to SAP BUILD APPS and SAP BPA in trail account
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I’m facing an issue while subscribing to SAP Build Apps and SAP Build Process Automation from the SAP BTP cockpit.

When I try to subscribe, I get the error message - that i have attached 

 

I’ve already tried the following steps:

  1. Checked entitlements and quotas for the subaccount

  2. Verified role collections

But the error still appears.

Could you please help me understand what might be causing this and how to fix it?

Thanks in advance for your support!

entry.title: Request failed with status code 503 in SAP BUILD CODE
entry.content:
Hello All,

We’re trying to connect our backend SAP S/4HANA system with SAP Build Code, but we’re getting a 503 Service Unavailable error during integration.
Could someone please guide us on what configuration might be missing?

 

Step we followed so far..

1, In BTP Cockpit, Establish a Destination xxx_xx_BuildCode with Basic Authentication with Additional properties as 

sap.processautomation.enabled=true
MobileEnabled=true
WebIDEEnabled=true
WebIDEUsage=odata_abap,dev_abap,odata_c4c,odata_gen,apihub_sandbox
sap.build.usage=odata_gen
HTML5.DynamicDestination=true
isCatalog=true
sap.applicationdevelopment.actions.enabled=true
product.name=SAP S/4HANA
BuildApps.Enabled=true
HTML5.ForwardAuthToken=true
BuildApps.ApiType=odata,rest
appgyver.Enabled=true
Authentication=BasicAuthentication
HTML5.Timeout=60000

2. Verified in BTP Cockpit → Destination shows “Reachable”

3. Opened SAP Build App → Control Tower → Add Destination and successfully added the same destination.

4, Created a project (Web + Mobile) → Navigated to Integration tab → Add Integration → BTP Destination → Selected the same destination. At this point, we receive the error:

Has anyone experienced this issue before or can suggest possible reasons for this 503 error?

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: New BTP Trial Account: 'Forbidden' Error in SAP Build & 'Destination Service' Creation Fails
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I recently had a widespread "Establish Trust" issue that was resolved by the SAP team. Following that, I have created a completely new BTP trial account to start fresh.

On this brand-new account, I have successfully subscribed to SAP Build and assigned all the necessary role collections. I can successfully access the SAP Build Lobby.

However, the account is still not functional. When I click "Create" after reviewing, to make a new application inside the SAP Build Lobby, I receive a "Forbidden" error.

  • (Correlation Id: a108cc8a-b036-4676-7049-e37deac6ec9b)

The recommended solution was to subscribe to the Destination Service (lite plan). When I attempt this, the service instance creation fails every time with the error: "Couldn't create service instance 'destination-instance'." (Screenshot of this error is attached).

This indicates that even this brand-new trial account is not being provisioned correctly on the backend, preventing essential services from being created and blocking all development.

Could the SAP team please investigate the provisioning status of my new trial account? Thank you for your help.

on clicking create after review for new apps creation

on clicking create after review

but the the multi combobox   is not giving any value  on F4.

Gaurang

entry.content:
When subscribed for SAP Build Apps from SAP Build Portfolio - then many features are not available as comp aired to standalone SAP Build Apps subscription .

Example :

Market Place

REST based Integration 

 

Anything I am missing ??

entry.title: SAP Build Apps Redirects to Initial Page in Work Zone on Browser Refresh
entry.content:
SAP Build Apps Redirects to Initial Page in Work Zone on Browser Refresh

 

Hello Community,

I am experiencing an issue with state management and routing when running an SAP Build Apps application deployed within SAP Build Work Zone Standard Edition (Trial Account).

Configuration and Setup:

  1. I created and deployed an SAP Build Apps application on sap build Work zone.

  2. In the Work Zone, I updated the Channel Manager and added the HTML5 Application in the content mange and then added it to my catalog. 

The Problem:

The application launches correctly from the tile and operates as expected. However, the application appears to be running without proper URL routing synchronization with the Work Zone shell:

  • When I navigate to a secondary page within the Build App, the URL in the browser address bar remains unchanged.

  • Consequently, if I perform a browser refresh (F5) while on a secondary page, the application redirects back to the application's initial/Home Page.

entry.title: Unable to authenticate SAP Build Platform
entry.content:
I am able to subscribe SAP build platform through boosters only and I unable login , it restricting like we can't authenticate you and mail not received from IAS to activate my custom identify provider account.
Note: I assigned roles for custom IAS .

entry.title: SAP Build Process Automation: Create an Automation to Extract Data
entry.content:
Hello,

I am trying to follow the tutorial provided in the link - https://developers.sap.com/tutorials/spa-create-automation.html#ccccd52c-2a13-402b-a748-61f93dff8b62 for a demo and I am dependent on the free trial version.

However when I am trying to follow the step - 2 To open the Excel Instance: and trying to drag the open excel activity I found it is not getting dragged and greyed out but that is contrary to the content of the tutorial. Can you help me? 

 

The open and close excel activities are not working as described in the tutorial steps.

entry.title: Problem in triggering automated process in app
entry.content:
Hello i'm having some issues with a very simple tutorial, but I follow all the steps and it doesn't work like it should. The button should trigger an automated process that I uploaded to the library and that I know it's working because a tested it, but for some reason it gives me a 404 error, where should I look te fix this, because I made the project twice to keep the human error out of the box but it keeps showing even following all the steps, I have a trial account but it shouldn't be a problem as far as I know. I uploaded as much pictures to give context but I don't where I should, if you can help I would appreciate it! Thank you

This is what I got in the browser's console, when I click on the button it returns a 404 error.


 SAP Build SAP Business Process Automation by Redwood SAP Learning Solution

entry.title: Perform CRUD operation from SAP BTP BAS on Datasphere.
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

We’re working on a BAS (CAPM) application and aiming to perform full CRUD operations using data from SAP Datasphere.

While we’ve successfully implemented the read (fetch) functionality using the architecture shown below, we’re currently facing challenges with enabling create, update, and delete operations directly on Datasphere tables.

 

 

We’d really appreciate any guidance, resources, or architectural suggestions that could help us achieve this. If anyone has experience or insights on enabling write operations with Datasphere from BAS, your support would be invaluable!

 

SAP Datasphere SAP Cloud Application Programming Model  SAP Fiori Cloud  

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Dynamic Handling of Credentials in SAP BPA
entry.content:
Hi everyone,
I am trying to build an automation which accesses various S/4HANA Instances with different credentials depending who started it or which desktop agent started it. I dont want to ask the user to input their credentials. Is there a good way of handling credentials dynamically in SAP BPA?
